    • createMatch

      public void createMatch(String matchId, int playersNumber, GameMode mode, PlayerConnection player) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException, TooManyPlayersException
      Creates a new match and adds the player to it
      Parameters:
      matchId - New match id.
      playersNumber - Number of players for the new match.
      mode - Game mode for the new match.
      player - Player who created the match and needs to be included.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the player is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the player lacks a nickname, if it is participating in another match, if there is already a player with such nickname of if there is no match with the given id.
      TooManyPlayersException - If there are too many players.

    • removeMatch

      public void removeMatch(Match match, String message) throws NullPointerException
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • addPlayerToMatch

      public void addPlayerToMatch(String matchId, PlayerConnection player) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException, TooManyPlayersException
      Adds a player to the match identified with the given match id.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the player is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the player lacks a nickname, if it is participating in another match, if there is already a player with such nickname of if there is no match with the given id.
      TooManyPlayersException - If there are too many players.
